column1: The Pit Room////Pit Room is one of my favorite restaurants and is in my opinion
column2: the best bbq in Houston! I've had several items from their menu including: brisket
column8: and their tortillas and it is all delicious (my faves though would have to be the brisket
column9: tortillas and the Mac and cheese). It can get pretty busy
column10: so seating might be hard to find
column11: but there is also seating available outside and next door at the bar. This place is definitely worth the hype.
